DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare long-term effect foam roll comparison static stretch control group hamstring flexibility . The investigator hypothesize participant foam roll static stretch group demonstrate increase flexibility control group , difference observe foam roll static stretch group .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Long-term Foam Rolling Compared Static Stretching Hamstring Muscle Flexibility
DOC.criteria: Active 90/90 hamstring length goniometric measurement great 10 degree baseline Active straight leg raise le 90 degree History low extremity injury include limited sprain , strain , fracture , surgical intervention lead decrease activity great two week within last six month Current involvement low extremity flexibility program outside regular activity
